programme.title: Sartana's Here Trade Your Pistol For A Coffin

programme.title: The Longest Drive
programme.desc: To save an old friend's ranch, the Beaudine brothers round up a gang of misfits to drive a huge herd to market. Join the epic action when a stableman, a retired gunslinger, a dried-out drunk and two sneaky rustlers, hit the dusty trail.

programme.title: A Minute to Pray, A Second to Die
programme.desc: In Tuscosa, New Mexico, the Governor offers amnesty papers to all outlaws but gunfighter Clay McCord's appearance triggers a violent confrontation between the local marshal, McCord, and other outlaws.

programme.title: Harlequin
programme.desc: An ambitious Australian senator's son is cured of leukaemia by a faith healer, but he discovers that there is a high price to pay. The senator is overjoyed when his son is pronounced well, but then he learns that the mysterious healer has seduced his wife and is threatening to disrupt his political career.

programme.title: The Man Called Noon
programme.desc: Rubal Noon blazes a trail of vengeance across the West after his family is massacred. No one is safe from his blood lusting fury. Suddenly, Noon is Ambushed and falls victim to loss of memory. A mysterious desperado comes to his aid for unknown reasons. Noon holds the secret to a fortune in gold. The desperado along with many others impatiently wait for Rubal Noons Memory to return. And when he does remember -- all hell breaks lose!

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A mysterious young woman arrives in Southport, North Carolina, and falls in love with a widowed store owner. However, her dark past intrudes in her new life.

credits.actor: Josh Duhamel,Julianne Hough,Cobie Smulders,David Lyons,Noah Lomax,Mimi Kirkland,Irene Ziegler,Jon Kohler

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: In the throes of a quarter-life crisis, Megan panics when her boyfriend proposes. She takes an opportunity to escape for a week, hiding out in the house of her new 16-year-old friend Annika and her world-weary single dad.

credits.actor: Keira Knightley,Chlo Grace Moretz,Sam Rockwell,Ellie Kemper,Mark Webber,Jeff Garlin,Gretchen Mol,Kaitlyn Dever,Daniel Zovatto,Jodi Thelen,Dylan Arnold

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

credits.actor: Brant Daugherty,Maiara Walsh,Cody Christian,Lauren Bowles,Alexandria Deberry,Nick Gomez,Theodus Crane,Trenton Rostedt,Eric Buarque,Joseph Aviel

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

credits.actor: Ensemble Cast

programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

credits.actor: Mandira Bedi,Shibani Dandekar

programme.title: Carpool
programme.desc: Daniel Miller has to take care of the carpool for his sons and the neighbourhood school children when his wife falls sick. However, in the course of the day, he finds himself a victim of a robbery.

credits.actor: Tom Arnold,David Paymer,Rhea Perlman,Rod Steiger,Kim Coates,Rachael Leigh Cook,Mikey Kovar,Micah Gardener,Jordan Blake Warkol,Colleen Rennison

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A neurotic thirty-something woman resolves to finally take control of her life once and for all, while looking for h love.

credits.actor: Rene Zellweger,Colin Firth,Hugh Grant,Gemma Jones,Jim Broadbent,Embeth Davidtz,Shirley Henderson,Sally Phillips,James Callis

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

credits.actor: Denzel Washington,John Goodman,Donald Sutherland,Embeth Davidtz,James Gandolfini,Elias Koteas,Gabriel Casseus,Michael J. Pagan,Robert Joy,Bill Clark

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie Wagner, a couple, decides to adopt three siblings Lizzie, Juan and Lita. But trouble knocks at their door when the children's troublesome birth mother is back in the frame.

credits.actor: Mark Wahlberg,Rose Byrne,Octavia Spencer,Isabela Moner,Tig Notaro,Gustavo Quiroz,Julianna Gamiz,Margo Martindale,Julie Hagerty,Michael O'Keefe,Tom Segura,Allyn Rachel,Brittney Rentschler,Jody Thompson,Joan Cusack,Gary Weeks,Joy Jacobson,Andrea Anders,Joselin Reyes,Iliza Shlesinger
